channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
im trying to make a shop named "donator shop" but when i try replace the items in shops.cfg to others it just makes an error to client so i cant logg in it looks like [code]shop = 22 Donator Shop 2 100 590 35 1755 667 2347 2402 550 746 5605 5 1351 10 303 10 1265 10 313 1000[/code] i maybe have to old client to add gs and d claw :L
please help.Thanks :P

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

im trying to make a shop named “donator shop”
but when i try replace the items in shops.cfg
to others it just makes an error to client so i cant logg in
it looks like

shop = 22	Donator Shop				2	100	590	35	1755	667	2347	2402	550	746	5605	5	1351	10	303	10	1265	10	313	1000
